description: Broker mentions two different SF values - AI should use the most recent/confident one

messages.content: Hi Scott, what's the SF for 1 Randolph Ct?

Hi Jill,

I think it's around 12,000 SF... actually let me check... yes it's 15,000 SF total.

Scott

notes: AI should use the corrected/final value (15000) not the initial estimate (12000)
